titleStmt.title: A form of prayer to be used next after the prayer in time of war and tumults throughout the kingdom of England, dominion of Wales and town of Berwick upon Tweed in all churches and chapels, at morning and evening prayer, as often as there is divine service during the time of His Majesties absence.
titleStmt.author: Church of England.
